did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.physdesc: Correspondence, photographs, technical reports and reprints, drafts of articles, manuscripts, and subject files.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Correspondence, photographs, technical reports and reprints, drafts of articles, manuscripts, and subject files pertaining to Ewald's career as a scientist working in the field of x-ray crystallography; also, personal and family papers.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Correspondence, photographs, technical reports and reprints, drafts of articles, manuscripts, and subject files pertaining to Ewald's career as a scientist working in the field of x-ray crystallography; also, personal and family papers.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Paul P. Ewald papers, #4586. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

Also several photos of unidentified people
